items.title: COVID-19 vaccination appointments available this week in Napa County
items.summary:
Kaiser Permanente, Ole’ Health, NorthBay Healthcare, Partnership Healthplan, Providence-St Joseph, and Napa County Public Health have joined forces to bring mass vaccination clinics to the Napa Valley. 
						 Additional Info...

items.title: Napa County Accepting Temporary Event Permit Applications
items.summary: The County of Napa will begin accepting Temporary Event Permit applications starting April 1, 2021. The State Health Order has recently been amended to allow outdoor live events starting next month. Under the State Health Order, there...
